import matplotlib.pyplot as plt


plt.plot([373,373,373,373,373,373,373,373,373,373,373,373,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,374,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,375,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376,376], [452,453,454,455,458,459,460,461,462,463,607,623,594,595,596,597,598,599,600,601,602,604,605,606,607,608,609,610,611,612,613,614,615,616,617,618,620,621,622,623,593,594,595,596,597,598,599,600,601,602,603,604,605,606,607,608,609,610,611,612,613,614,615,616,617,618,619,620,621,622,623,624,625,626,627,628,629,630,631,632,633,634,635,636,637,638,639,640,641,642,643,644,645,646,647,648,649,650,651,652,653,591,592,593,594,595,596,599,600,601,602,603,604,605,606,607,608,609,610,611,612,613,614,615,618,619,620,621,622,623,624,625], 'k.')

plt.xlim(0, 720)
plt.ylim(0, 960)
plt.axis([0, 720, 0, 960])
plt.savefig('.\\Bad_Apple_matplotlib_plots\\20960.jpg')
